sentences.english: Hope and courage are two bright diamonds in the crown of success.
sentences.chinese: 指望战英勇是胜利之冕下两颗敞亮的钻石。

sentences.english: The hard fut battle for recognition has been won, but it is by no means over.
sentences.chinese: 这场艰苦的女性能力认可战虽已打赢，却远未终结。

sentences.english: Nearly 30,000 people have been killed since the campaign began.
sentences.chinese: 自从缉毒战开始以来，已有近3万人丧生。

sentences.english: Fights the mechanism through on - line machine-made peace treaty, can quicker obtain the high integral.
sentences.chinese: 通过联机机制和约战机制，能够更快的得到高积分。

sentences.english: Fighting Space Wars must be supported by many different weapons systems.
sentences.chinese: 打空间战必须有多种不同武器系统作支撑。

sentences.english: The analytical basis of the discussions was China's postwar industrialization.
sentences.chinese: 中国战的工业化建设，是这场讨论的思想基础。

sentences.english: The division of the city grew out of the zones of occupation established at the end of World War II.
sentences.chinese: 二次大战结束时形成的战领区导致了该城的分裂。

sentences.english: The flight or fight response includes a rapid heartbeat and dry mouth, trembling hands.
sentences.chinese: 战或逃的反应包括心跳加速，嘴巴发干，双手颤抖。

sentences.english: Therefore, much still remains to be done in china’s anti-drug campaign.
sentences.chinese: 因此，中国的反毒战任重而道远。

sentences.english: Thus, you can use warfare to carve out commercial advantages for your country.
sentences.chinese: 因此，您可以使用战，以开拓为你的国家的商业优势。

sentences.english: I asked Baobao, Tiantian and other little friends to come to my party.
sentences.chinese: 我请了宝宝，苦苦战其他小朋友去到场我的死日散会。

sentences.english: Yes, fights and then, art of war it often, wonderful application, all a heart.
sentences.chinese: 是的，阵而后战，兵法之常，运用之妙，全乎一心。

sentences.english: A would-be defeated troops will engage his enemy first before looking for chances of victory.
sentences.chinese: 打败战的军队先同敌人交战，而后希望侥幸取胜。

sentences.english: They are the Sudirman Cup , the Thomas Cup and the Uber cup .
sentences.chinese: 他们是苏迪曼杯，汤姆斯杯赛战尤伯杯。

sentences.english: History is replete with accounts of expert tacticians choosing the proper moment to impact the battle.
sentences.chinese: 历史充满帐目战专家选择适当时机，影响战斗。

sentences.english: It was induced when shortly before the war I received a picture of my sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 它被引起是在战前不久，当时我收到一张女友的照片。
